description:
Decommissioned product.

The MODIS/Terra Land Cover Type Yearly L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG product (MOD12C1)  contains three multi temporal classification schemes describing land cover  properties at a 0.05 degree spatial resolution over one year (12 months of  input data) periods. Each classification is accompanied by associated science  data sets (SDSs) defining Land Cover Assessment, Land Cover Percentage, and  Land Cover QC. 

The first Land Cover classification scheme identifies the 17 classes of land  cover defined by the International Geosphere-Biosphere Programme (IGBP). The  second Land Cover classification scheme is specific to MODIS Land Product  development at the University of Maryland and is a version of the IGBP modified  to exclude wetlands, vegetation mosaic, and snow information. The third Land  Cover classification scheme is the input for the MODIS LAI/fPAR product,  MOD15A2, which emphasizes vegetation classes. 

The Land Cover QC SDS marks each pixel with bit-encoded, high-level QC  information related to production. The Land Cover Assessment SDS imparts a  confidence value to the classification of each pixel. Land Cover Percentage is  a multidimensional SDS that displays what percentage of each pixel is covered  by a given Land Cover type, for example there is a data layer identifying how  much of a pixel contains water, another data layer identifying how much of a  pixel contains grasslands, or other land types. 

V004 Data Set Characteristics (decommissioned): 
Area: Global 
Image Dimensions: 3D LC Percent (row/column/# of LC Classes) 
Size: 3600 x 7200 rows columns 
Average File Size: 1200 MB 
Resolution: 0.05 degree (~5600m) 
Projection: GCPT_GEO 
Data Type: 8-Bit Unsigned Integer 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS): 10
title: MODIS/Terra Land Cover Type Yearly L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V004
